entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:29 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:29 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
